message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $180 is already a competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $150?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $150 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120, which is the price I'd be willing to pay to buy the product from John. Can you meet me at $135?
